settings.text:
Social media and content posted by influencers are incredibly important and a crucial tool to help individuals find much needed health advice or just a good laugh.

As moms, when we’ve needed support, didn’t know what to make for dinner, didn’t know how to keep our kids occupied or had a simple question, your content helped us through it.

We are grateful for your posts and have no clue how parents survived prior to social media! We know the blood, sweat and tears (literally) that you’ve sacrificed to put your best content forward. In order to thank you for supporting our brand, Kids Station has created an affiliate program.

Benefits:

Earn 10% revenue share for every purchase from our website.

Opportunities to try Kids Station products for free.

Discount codes from our website.

To apply please email support@kidstation.in and include:

Name, mailing address and phone number.

Website URL if applicable.

Social media platforms used and social media handles.

A brief description of your site and your marketing plans for the brand.
